channel.title: Whats the prob?

item.title: Whats the prob?
item.dc:creator: @ramsv94 ramsv94
item.description:
@ramsv94 wrote:

i added this code and i wanted it so u cant get down without veracs but u still can with ts code whats my problem???

else if (useItemID == 954 && atObjectID == 3827) // kq tunnel
            {
                if ((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755 || playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4753 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4759 || playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4757)== false) {
                sendMessage("Please Return with full Verca to enter the KQ's Lair.");
                }
                  else if ((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755
                    || playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4757
                            || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4759
                            || playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4753)== true);{
                deleteItem(954, getItemSlot(954), 1);
                teleportToX = 3508;
                teleportToY = 9494;
                sendMessage(
                        "WELCOME TO THE KQ'S LAIR HOPE U BROUGHT A TEAM OR PREPARE TO DIE!");
            }
